IRS990.Description: PROGRAM AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICES - DOMESTIC PROGRAMS ASSISTED OVER 1200 LITERACY GROUPS AND THEIR VOLUNTEERS AND STUDENTS THROUGH TRAINING,TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE AND FINANCIAL SUPPORT OF THEIR PROGRAMS COMMON TO PROLITERACY'S MISSION.

Activity2.Description: STRATEGIC INITIATIVES AND CAPACITY BUILDING PROVIDES STRATEGIC POSITIONING AND LITERACY PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT AND COORDINATION WITH COMMUNITY BASED ORGANIZATIONS.

Activity3.Description: PUBLIC EDUCATION - PROGRAMS AND PROJECTS THAT SUPPORT AND DISSEMINATE INFORMATION ABOUT LITERACTY TO THE PUBLIC, COMMUNITIES AND EDUCATORS ABOUT THE ROLE OF LITERACY IN A FUNCTIONING WORLD.
